synopsis.text: Su Dai's timeless tale from feudal China comes to life in this captivating anime, where a humble fisherman becomes an unexpected spectator to an intriguing spectacle. As he attempts to reel in his catch, a snipe and a clam vie for his attention, each trying to outwit the other for a coveted morsel. The clam's attempt to claim a worm is swiftly thwarted by the snipe, sparking a bitter feud between the two. Delighted by the ensuing tussle, the fisherman finds himself privy to an age-old lesson: beware of those who may benefit from your strife. This engaging anime invites viewers to explore the subtle complexities of human nature through the lens of a seemingly simple tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
